ca.nengo.ui.lib.util.menus

Class PopupMenuBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.nengo.ui.lib.util.menus.AbstractMenuBuilder
      • ca.nengo.ui.lib.util.menus.PopupMenuBuilder

  • public class PopupMenuBuilder
extends AbstractMenuBuilder
    Used to build a popup menu. The created menu can later be converted to a Swing component.
